# ButtonState Enumeration

> [!CAUTION]
> This enum is still in pre-release.  Its signature may change or it may be removed in future releases.

The state of a button on a keyboard, controller, or touch interface.

### **Pressed**
`Pressed = "Pressed"`
### **Released**
`Released = "Released"`
